specials.title: Double chocolate cake
specials.description: Molten chocolate cake served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and strawberry coulis.

specials.title: Monster cookie
specials.description: A homemade chocolate chip cookie, topped with vanilla ice cream, hot fudge, whipped cream, nuts and a cherry.

specials.title: Chocolate pudding
specials.description: Our signature croissants baked with custard and chocolate chips. Topped with vanilla ice cream, caramel sauce and almonds.
